title: Hour 2: Taking Charge
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and Bart Scott react to the NBA schedule release and debate what the Knicks need to do to be in the mix this season. We dive into Stephen A.'s Top 10 NFL storylines with #7 going to the Rams. Can they repeat as Super Bowl Champions or will the Chargers beat them to it? Stephen A. sits down with Kamaru Usman ahead of his welterweight title fight against Leon Edwards this Saturday. Plus, breaking news on Deshaun Watson's suspension.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Are the Chargers the most complete team in the NFL?
